nodes.text: Tos was a male Twi'lek who served as a specialist in the Mantellian army of the Galactic Republic during the Cold War against the Sith Empire. During the war he was stationed on the planet Ord Mantell, where a civil war had broken out between the Republic backed Ord Mantell Central Authority and the Mantellian Separatist Movement. Triank was posted on the outskirts of the Republic held Fort Garnik on Avilatan island, where he operated a stall from which he sold heavy armor. While at his stall Triank wore the standard issue Mantellian army uniform: blue armor and white pants. He had blue skin, no hair and purple eyes.
Tos first appeared in the 2011 MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare. In the game Hurwell's acts as a Republic heavy armor vendor on Ord Mantell.
